    • Method Detail

      • runCommand

        public static void runCommand​(src.crypter.util.InputMode inputMode,
                              java.lang.String inputPath,
                              boolean saveOutput,
                              java.lang.String outputPath)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Runs the command to gather text input, and then to decrypt it. The output will be printed to the user and saved to a file if the user chooses.
        Parameters:
        inputMode - - The method of text input. -string will accept input from the user, -file will input from a specified file.
        inputPath - - The path of the input file. Only used if -file is passed.
        saveOutput - - Determines whether or not the program's output will be saved to a file.
        outputPath - - The path of the output file. Only used if -save is passed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - Thrown if an input mode was not specified.

      • inputString

        private static java.lang.String inputString​()
        Prompts the user to input a string to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        The user's input.

      • loadFile

        private static java.lang.String loadFile​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads the text from a specified file to be decrypted.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - The path of the input file.
        Returns:
        The contents of the input file.

      • decryptString

        private static java.lang.String decryptString​(java.lang.String encryptedString)
        Decrypts the text that the user has provided.
        Parameters:
        encryptedString - - The encrypted text.
        Returns:
        The decrypted text.

      • saveOutput
